summary: Adds 5 Dirty Books that increase One Handed Stats.
descriptionHtml:
This is something of a… social experiment. This mod adds 5 pornographic training novels to the game that can all be purchased from Belethors shop in Whiterun. All 5 novels increase your characters one-handed combat skill. And yes, they are actual pornographic novels, as in short stories.

Let me be frank, this isn’t a mod project. The 5 books currently in the mod are all that are being created. If somebody else wants to flood nexus with dirty books… well… that’s not my problem.

Warning: Some of the short stories are pretty raunchy. Be at least 18 to download. If you are younger than that then blame your parents…

Requires: Skyrim Esm
Permissions: If you want to use this for something else… just go right ahead. Same as all my other stuff, it’s a resource.
author: jcdenton2012
